InstructionData.Title: Atmospherics Monitor
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Atmospherics Monitor # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias O2Pressure d1 alias CO2Pressure d2 alias N2Pressure d3 alias H2Pressure d4 alias XPressure d5
alias device r0 alias pressure r1 # overall pressure alias ratio r2 # ratio of gas alias partial r3 # partial pressure of gas alias o2pp r4 alias n2pp r5 alias co2pp r6 alias h2pp r7 alias xpp r8 alias no2pp r9 alias color r10 alias temp1 r11 alias toxin r12
define LED HASH("StructureConsoleLED5") define O2H HASH("O2 Display") define OK 2 define ERROR 4 define WARN 5 define O2ERROR 20 define O2WARN 25 define TOXINMAX 0.5 define TOXINWARN 0.1 define H2MAX 0.01 define H2WARN 0
init: move device 1 initloop: bgt device 5 start bdns dr0 nodevice s dr0 On 1 s dr0 Mode 0 s dr0 Color OK nodevice: add device device 1 j initloop
start: l pressure GasSensor Pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen mul o2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul co2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen mul n2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioVolatiles mul h2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioPollutant mul xpp ratio pressure add toxin xpp h2pp
o2: bdns O2Pressure co2 #s O2Pressure Setting o2pp sbn LED O2H Setting o2pp slt temp1 o2pp O2WARN select color temp1 WARN OK slt temp1 o2pp O2ERROR select color temp1 ERROR color s O2Pressure Color color
co2: bdns CO2Pressure n2 s CO2Pressure Setting co2pp
n2: bdns N2Pressure h2 s N2Pressure Setting n2pp
h2: bdns H2Pressure x s H2Pressure Setting h2pp sgt temp1 h2pp H2WARN select color temp1 WARN OK sge temp1 h2pp H2MAX select color temp1 ERROR color s H2Pressure Color color
x: bdns XPressure done s XPressure Setting xpp sgt temp1 toxin TOXINWARN select color temp1 WARN OK sge temp1 toxin TOXINMAX select color temp1 ERROR color s XPressure Color color
done: yield j start
